clues.text: He shared "A Brief History of a Brief History" in his "Black Holes and Baby Universes and Other Essays"
A book of essays by Joan Didion has this same title as a plain-covered Beatles LP
A few years before his death from cancer, this film critic reflected on his life in "Go Gentle Into That Good Night"
The title of his "Me Talk Pretty One Day" comes from him trying to master French in Paris
Alice Walker's 1975 essay "Looking for Zora" sparked new interest in this author who was largely forgotten at her death
Consolidated this inventor, your history in New York goes back almost 200 years, to before he was even born
Pacific Gas & Electric, we hear you're going to do this with 10,000 miles of power lines to keep them from sparking wildfires
Florida Power & Light, given your state's nickname it makes sense that you have 42 major plants for this type of energy
Vistra, sorry to pick on you, but you had problems as this state where you're based froze in the dark in February 2021
Knoxville Utilities Board, you get your power from this agency set up under the New Deal in 1933
Melodramatic daytime TV "opera"
To drop down fast into water
Biological cell mass like cartilage or muscle
Horny lizard covering
In a George Eliot novel title, a mill is on this river

rounds.comments: (Ken: The letters J, E, and T will all show up in that order in all the correct responses.)

clues.text: To use a syringe to put a drug into a person's body
A member of the Society of Jesus
Adjective meaning too willing to criticize others & say they are wrong or deficient
The suspension of a court proceeding
From the Latin meaning "again" & "young", it means to make someone youthful & vital again
Named for Ponce de Leon, Leon County
Maricopa County
Kent County (one of only 3 in the state)
Merrimack County
Travis County
Desert & New England are species of this rabbit named for a fluffy appendage
Rabbits are born fur-less & blind; these close relatives are born fully developed, with fur & open eyes
Like deer, rabbit genders are divided into does & these
In 1859 a few European rabbits were released on this continent; by the 1920s there were billions
An area where rabbits breed goes by this male first name
The Yiddish word naches means "joy", usually from the achievements of these relatives
This coarse adjective can be a verb--if you ruin my good mood, you do it to "my mellow"
Add 2 letters to a body organ to get this verb meaning to encourage or lift spirits
To increase the seriousness of a crime, or to annoy me with petty actions
Latin vocare, "to call", is one origin of this word meaning to irritate someone into action

rounds.comments: (Ken: We've changed one word of the Constitution; you need to fix it.)

clues.text:
5th:
"Nor shall any person be subject for the same offence to be twice put in Pictionary of life or limb"

1st:
"Congress shall make no law... prohibiting... the right of the people peaceably to mambo"
6th: "The accused shall enjoy the right to a speedy and public freeway" (there's an amendment L.A. can really get behind!)

8th:
"Excessive bail shall not be required... nor cruel and unusual amphibians inflicted"
24th: "The right of citizens... to vote... shall not be denied... by reason of failure to pay any redonkulous tax or other tax"
Aimee Mann paid tribute to this city's 1939 World's Fair with her song "Fifty Years After The Fair"
This fourth season of "American Horror Story" is set at Elsa's Cabinet of Curiosities in Jupiter, Florida
There are kids at a fairground at the start of the video for this Springsteen song about a ride
This British event ended in 1788, but is remembered largely thanks to a Simon & Garfunkel song
Age 11, he made his movie debut in "It Happened at the World's Fair", starring Elvis, whom he later portrayed
In Monopoly, you roll the dice & you'll pay the price if your Community Chest card reads, "Go to" here, "Go directly to" here
7 & 11 can be lucky numbers, but financially, going to this type of U.S. court to file Chapter 7 or 11 is never fun
You did not want to be in these 2 cities after the Lord says "their sin is very grievous" in Genesis 18
These islands off Africa were the wrong place for travelers in 2021 as a volcanic eruption closed La Palma's airport
The U.S. decided Afghanistan is the wrong place to be & on July 1, 2021 left this air base, hub of operations for 20 years
Norfolk Island, a territory of Australia, gives its name to a type of this tree also called a living Christmas tree
In 1998 the capital of this U.S. Pacific territory got a name change from Agana to the Chamorro name Hagatna
The U.S. Virgin Islands were purchased from this European country in 1917
Great Britain's Falkland Islands are also claimed by Argentina, where they are called these
Though part of its name was a Roman designation for Scotland, this "New" Pacific island territory belongs to France
Borrowing a title from David Bowie, Tracy K. Smith won a 2012 Pulitzer Prize for her collection "Life on" this planet
He wrote many of the poems in "Old Possum's Book of Practical Cats" for his godchildren
"Sunflower Sutra" is one of the "Other Poems" in his "Howl and Other Poems"
The title of this Elizabeth Barrett Browning collection does not come from her nationality, but from her nickname
"Song of Myself" is the longest & best known poem in this Walt Whitman collection first published in 1855

rounds.text: 2 states carried by Michael Dukakis besides Massachusetts, his home state
